game.name: Echoes From The Soul
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: "Let the fragments reverberate within your being. Let the echoes from your soul vibrate within every living bodycell. Now, my child, you're whole again. Be it a good or a bad thing, we'll leave for you to choose."
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Let the fragments reverberate within your being. Let the echoes from your soul vibrate within every living bodycell. Now, my child, you're whole again. Be it a good or a bad thing, we'll leave for you to choose."
